contents.text: Thank you for calling Securly South Bay, your cloud-based web filtering and parental control solution.
For technical assistance with setup or network issues, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Fix filter connectivity issues on our office network as soon as possible
Help me troubleshoot why Securly is blocking websites incorrectly on my home network.
Troubleshoot DNS filtering configuration on our Securly deployment
I need help installing and configuring Securly on my home Wi-Fi network.
I need help installing the Securly filtering agent on my lab workstation so I can access essential physics research sites.

contents.text: For account, billing, and Parent Portal inquiries, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to Billing and Account Support.

navigationGoals: Update payment information and clarify the latest invoice charges
I need to update my billing info and review my latest invoice for my Securly subscription.
Download and reconcile last quarter’s billing invoice from the billing portal
I’d like assistance reviewing my billing statement and updating my payment details.
I need to update or retrieve my department’s billing invoice for our Securly subscription for my physics research group.

contents.text: For Sales and Product Information, press '2'.
To learn about setup and deployment in schools or homes, press '1'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our Deployment Specialists.

navigationGoals: Explore deployment options for rolling out Securly across our school network
I'm setting up Securly for my child's home learning and need guidance on deployment best practices.
Request best practices for cloud-based deployment across campus networks
I want information on how to deploy Securly in my home for my grandchildren’s internet access.
I’d like information on how to deploy Securly across our university’s physics computer labs.

contents.text: For live demo scheduling and feature overview, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our Sales team for a demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demo to review Securly’s features and functionality
I'd like to schedule a live demo of Securly's parental control features before renewing my plan.
Schedule a live demo of Securly’s real-time web filtering analytics
I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how Securly’s features work before purchasing.
I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how Securly’s features can support our physics department’s web filtering needs.
